verbose_text: Therefore, the mechanical action of LFAMF on GMNPs linked through the aptamer with tumor cells can be explained as follows : Fn causes twitching of the integrin beta-domain which leads to its activation XREF_BIBR and initiation of cell death by the caspase cascade induction of primary apoptosis followed by an increase in sodium content and cancer cell necrosis.
evidence: Fn causes twitching of the integrin
